```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
x <- readxl::read_xlsx(
  "../data/utmb_puerto-vallarta100/PuertoVallartaUTMB20220818.xlsx",
  sheet = 1, 
  skip = 1
)

summary(x)
```
Convert distances and elevations.

```{r}
xc <- 
  x %>%
  mutate(altitude.feet = `Altitude meters` * 3.28084,
         distance.int.mi = `Distance Interval km` * 0.621371,
         total.dist.mi = `Total Distance km` * 0.621371,
         elev.gain.tot.ft = Elevation...5 * 3.28084,
         elev.desc.tot.ft = Elevation...6 * 3.28084)

summary(xc)
```

Correct times.

```{r}
xc %>%
  mutate(cutoff = lubridate::with_tz(`Cut-off`, tz = "CDT"))

```
